name: local/camofox-browser-mcp
description: MCP server that controls a local camofox-browser instance.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Sets the minimum log level for output (e.g., 'debug', 'info', 'warn').

environmentVariables.name: CAMOFOX_BASE_URL
environmentVariables.description: Base URL of the running camofox-browser backend.

environmentVariables.name: CAMOFOX_DEFAULT_USER_ID
environmentVariables.description: Default user ID used when tool inputs omit userId.

environmentVariables.name: CAMOFOX_DEFAULT_SESSION_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Default session key used when tool inputs omit sessionKey.

environmentVariables.name: CAMOFOX_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Optional API key for cookie import endpoint.

environmentVariables.name: CAMOFOX_ADMIN_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Optional admin key required for stop endpoint.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_HOST
environmentVariables.description: The hostname for the HTTP server.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_PORT
environmentVariables.description: The port to run the HTTP server on.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_ENDPOINT_PATH
environmentVariables.description: The endpoint path for the MCP server.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Sets the minimum log level for output (e.g., 'debug', 'info', 'warn').

environmentVariables.name: CAMOFOX_BASE_URL
environmentVariables.description: Base URL of the running camofox-browser backend.

environmentVariables.name: CAMOFOX_DEFAULT_USER_ID
environmentVariables.description: Default user ID used when tool inputs omit userId.

environmentVariables.name: CAMOFOX_DEFAULT_SESSION_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Default session key used when tool inputs omit sessionKey.

environmentVariables.name: CAMOFOX_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Optional API key for cookie import endpoint.

environmentVariables.name: CAMOFOX_ADMIN_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Optional admin key required for stop endpoint.
